text:
The documentation of the zip
<URL:http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/zip.html> and unzip
<URL:http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/unzip.html> tasks link to the
document
<URL:http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/guide/internat/encoding.doc.html>
in their description of the 'encoding' attribute. The linked document is no
longer available at this URL. Please update the documentation accordingly.

I assume the new URL should be one of the following:
  http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/guide/intl/encoding.doc.html
  http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/guide/intl/encoding.doc.html
creator: n-roeser@gmx.net

text:
More documentation files link to the old J2SDK 1.2 sources.

A quick grep in the ant-1.6.5 source tree makes me believe that the following
files are affected:

docs/faq.html
docs/manual/CoreTasks/concat.html
docs/manual/CoreTasks/javadoc.html
docs/manual/CoreTasks/manifest.html
docs/manual/CoreTasks/tstamp.html
docs/manual/CoreTasks/unzip.html
docs/manual/CoreTasks/zip.html
src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/AntStructure.java
src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/LoadFile.java
src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/LoadProperties.java
src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/Zip.java
src/main/org/apache/tools/zip/ZipFile.java
src/main/org/apache/tools/zip/ZipOutputStream.java
creator: n-roeser@gmx.net
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
Fixed in HEAD.

Links are now pointing to the JDK 5 API
Many thanks for spotting that.
